title: Ticket #5574: Doc for Submitter ad missing a bunch of attributes
description:
While I was documenting the new submitter attributes for #5519. I noticed that there are many attributes in the submitter ad that are not documented. Most of these are sort of 'boilerplate' attributes that are not specific to the submitter ad.

For reference, here is a submitter ad from 8.5.3 

example 8.5.3 submitter ad
AddressV1 = "{[ p=\"primary\"; a=\"128.105.136.34\"; port=6909; n=\"Internet\"; spid=\"10900_1662_5\"; noUDP=true; ], [ p=\"IPv4\"; a=\"128.105.136.34\"; port=6909; n=\"Internet\"; spid=\"10900_1662_5\"; noUDP=true; ]}"
